Motoi Shimizu

Motoi Shimizu is a Tokyo-based developer who work with code: openFrameworks / web-based interactivity. After several years of career as a web front-end engineer, he graduated from Dynamic Sensory Programming course at International Academy of Media Arts and Science. Stayed at Interface Culture in Kunstuniversit√§t Linz (Austria) in 2010 winter semester. He started writing codes since 2010 with keywords: playful interactivity, real world oriented networking.
